guarantee.title: Double
guarantee.body: At our OnlyFans agency, results come first. That is why we guarantee doubling your revenue within a maximum of 3 months - otherwise we waive our entire share. That means: if we do not deliver, our work was completely free for you. Our proven strategies, individual support, and data-driven decisions make your success predictable. Your growth is our promise.*

applicationSteps.title: Your OnlyFans success starts here. Predictable. Step by Step.

statsCta.title: We work monthly with 3-5 new creators. Are you one of them?

items.q: What is Fanique Primus?
items.a: Fanique Primus is an agency known for its unique perspective, innovative approach, and dedicated team. Our goal is to promote talent and help them achieve their dreams.

items.q: What are the goals of Fanique Primus?
items.a: Our managers have the expertise to position you successfully on other platforms as well. Together we build a plan to reach your individual goals.

items.q: Does Fanique Primus only work in Germany?
items.a: No, we operate worldwide. However, we recommend focusing on US content because growth potential, anonymity, and compensation are often better than in Germany or Europe.

items.q: How can I make a living from social media?
items.a: Reach is important, but choosing the right niche and partners also matters. Your personal manager helps identify the right opportunities and build the best partnerships.

items.q: Can I keep my full-time job?
items.a: At the beginning we recommend keeping your current job until you are successful enough in OnlyFans or social media to live from it.

items.q: What does working with Fanique Primus look like?
items.a: The collaboration starts with an application through our form. After careful review, we contact you within 48 hours.

items.q: How much time should I plan per week?
items.a: We offer flexible options to optimize collaboration. The time required depends on your reach, planned events, and shoots.

items.q: What tasks will I be responsible for?
items.a: Tasks vary depending on your preferences. You can create content yourself or delegate it to your manager. The exact split is discussed with your manager.

items.q: Can I apply again if I was rejected?
items.a: Yes, a re-application is possible if at least one month has passed since the last application. If you have worked on your career in the meantime, your chances are good.

items.q: How often will I be in contact with my account manager?
items.a: Your manager is available around the clock. Whether daily exchange or weekly calls - communication depends on your needs.

items.q: Do I need to create and edit the content myself?
items.a: You can create content yourself, but your manager supports you with advice and co-creation of content.

items.q: Why do I need a manager?
items.a: A manager simplifies your day-to-day, handles organization, builds a network for you, and connects you with relevant people and partners.

items.q: How do I contact my manager?
items.a: Initial contact happens after your successful application. After that your manager is available anytime for questions and support.

items.q: How can my channels grow best?
items.a: As an exclusive Fanique Primus talent, you benefit from structured processes and the expertise of our social media specialists.

items.q: Can my channels be managed independently?
items.a: Yes, we recommend not relying only on OnlyFans. Diversifying across platforms can increase your financial success.

items.q: Are there additional ways to be more successful?
items.a: We support you comprehensively so you can benefit from our entrepreneurial mindset and not rely on a single income source.

items.q: Can I stay anonymous and still succeed?
items.a: Yes, anonymity is possible. We have successful strategies that allow high earnings even anonymously.

items.q: How do you motivate your talent to become more successful?
items.a: Our management program grows with you. We foster a mindset that encourages you to think bigger and set bigger goals.

items.q: Can I work with you if I am already successful?
items.a: Yes, if you are already successful on social media, we show you how to leverage and expand that advantage.

items.q: In which cities is Fanique Primus present?
items.a: Our main locations are worldwide.

items.q: Is there a limit to talents?
items.a: Yes, the number of our exclusive talents is limited. However, we keep expanding our portfolio. Take your chance and apply today.

items.q: Do you support finding brand partners?
items.a: Together with your manager, you find the right partners. They support you with search, negotiation, and execution of collaborations.
